description:
Helping injured victims throughout Florida, The Turnbull Firm in Orlando provides unmatched advocacy and support to individuals and families suffering needlessly as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. With additional law offices in Lakeland and Winter Haven, they have grown to become one of the most prominent and successful legal practices in the state for motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, nursing home abuse, slip-and-fall accidents and other preventable tragedies.

Led by top-ranked and highly experienced trial lawyer Sanga Turnbull, the law firm has seen remarkable success over the years. They have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for their plaintiff injury clients, including numerous six- and seven-figure awards. This success is the direct result of their unwavering commitment to their clients, and you can trust they will fight aggressively to increase your chances for a successful outcome.

A former insurance defense attorney, Mr. Turnbull has a wealth of insight into the industry, enabling him to devise the most effective strategies possible for his plaintiff clients. Honored for his outstanding professionalism and service, Mr. Turnbull has earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from his peers, and his law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from their satisfied clients.

To begin the process of obtaining justice in the wake of an avoidable accident that has left you or a loved one seriously injured or worse, you can contact The Turnbull Firm to schedule a free initial consultation. They also offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you safe and healthy.
